text: 🚨New Report: The High Cost of Healthcare Affordability Crisis in America! 💸🏥 Did you know? 🤔 Americans can only afford an avg. monthly payment of $97 for out-of-pocket medical costs! 😱 Skipping preventive care, prescription drugs, mental health, and diagnostic testing! 💔 PayZen's AI-powered solutions aim to tackle these issues, enhancing patient satisfaction and improving financial outcomes for providers! 💻💰
